ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Sure, we ll tell ya. Airbomber said, making sure nobody was aiming their blaster s at Infectra. Hey, everyone! This is Infectra! She s with us! Airbomber

"Sure, we'll tell ya." Airbomber said, making sure nobody was aiming their =
blaster's at Infectra.

"Hey, everyone! This is Infectra! She's with us!" A=
irbomber said. Plintissa growled.

"These Radicons fired at me, Artist, and=
 Dracona when we tried to help them and ran away! I don't think they could =
be trusted!" Plintissa said.

"We have our gestalt form and we're useful an=
d powerful." Stranato said. Plintissa walked away angrily...
  ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent=
: Tuesday, July 04, 2000 7:12 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *Infectr=
a nods and follows the Radicons* Infectra: How can you tell if one is not t=
o be trusted? *Infectra says to the Radicons*
    ----- Original Message --=
--- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, July=
 04, 2000 5:36 PM
    Subject: Neo Beast Wars


    Sinesis and Sinister bo=
th kept poking each other, but saying nothing when the other looked. They b=
oth grabbed their swords and were about to stab each other, but they put th=
e swords away and did a cheesy hug instead.

    Plintissa and Dracona deci=
ded to follow Artist and they walked off to the Ark. Once there, they enter=
ed the base.

    "Hey, have any of you seen a bot come by here just starin=
g?" Plintissa asked. Dracona started to look around in logical places a lun=
atic might hide.

    Deemos and Inzola got bored of sitting around and dri=
nking tea and they left again.

    "Who shall we join with, dear?" Inzola =
asked.

    "Whomever wants out assistance." Deemos replies. They walk on u=
ntil they see the Alliance base.

    "This one looks good, lets go and ask=
 them if they have any need for us!" Deemos said. Inzola and Deemos walked =
up to the base.

    "Ahem, excuse us, but we're looking to join your fine =
team, we have been looking for a faction to join, and it appears that it is=
 you who will obviously win the Neo Beast Wars, so we wish to join you, wha=
t fo we have to do to join?" Deemos asked. (Something reasonable, please, n=
o killing a bot things or anything.)

    Gangon had a nightmare, He was ag=
ain tied to the magical chair when Sinister and Sinesis came up to him. The=
n BrightBlade did, and then Dracona. They all pulled of their masks and wer=
e 2 headed, one head Inzola, and the other head Deemos. Gangon screamed and=
 held hbis head in pain. Gangon woke up, and remembered that he couldn't mo=
ve. He considered that thing about getting a replacement body, how it would=
 be a good idea just in case he had to get out of this dump, which was prob=
able if he wanted to kill himself. He waited for Plintissa and Dracona to c=
ome back.

    The Radicons looked at Infectra.

    "Now, all you need to =
do is follow us, we have set you on friend of the Maximals, I'm sure they w=
on't mind, seeing as how you would make a great addition to their group." A=
irbomber said. They walked inside of the Maximal base, waiting for Infectra=
 to follow.

    Artist walked around the war room in circles, not quite kn=
owing where he was going.
